title: Viral Post Falsely Claims Sambit Patra Removed as BJP Spokesperson
subtitle: A post put up by the Facebook page ‘Viral in India’ claims that Sambit Patra has been removed from his post as BJP national spokesperson.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim: A post put up by the Facebook page ‘Viral in India’ claims that Sambit Patra has been removed from his post as BJP national spokesperson.
